com.tutego.jrtf

Class RtfHeader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tutego.jrtf.RtfHeader
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RtfHeaderColor, RtfHeaderFont

    public abstract class RtfHeader
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory and base class that represents a RTF header. Different subclasses defines specific headers for
    • font definitions
    • color tables
    • style sheets (not implemented yet)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static RtfHeaderColor color(int r, int g, int b)
      Creates a new color definition.
      static RtfHeaderFont font(java.lang.String fontname)
      Creates a new font definition.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • font

        public static RtfHeaderFont font(java.lang.String fontname)
        Creates a new font definition.
        Parameters:
        fontname - Name of the font.
        Returns:
        RtfHeaderFont to configure the font.

      • color

        public static RtfHeaderColor color(int r,
                   int g,
                   int b)
        Creates a new color definition. From the color values just the last 8 bit are used.
        Parameters:
        r - Red.
        g - Green.
        b - Blue.
        Returns:
        RtfHeaderColor to set the position of the font.
